title: "Machine-learning framework finds characters' actions in movie scripts reflect gender stereotypes"
excerpt: "Researchers have developed a novel machine-learning framework that uses scene descriptions in movie scripts to automatically recognize different characters' actions. Applying the framework to hundreds of movie scripts showed that these actions tend to reflect widespread gender stereotypes,"
